name: financial-literacy-platform
description: Financial Literacy Platform for Bharat - Offline-first gamified learning

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx prisma db seed
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/node_modules backend/dist backend/prisma/dev.db frontend/node_modules frontend/.next
